data.title: Norway has issued a threat to Brazil that if rising deforestation in the Amazon rainforest is not reversed, its billion-dollar financial assistance to Brazil’s Amazon fund will fall to zero.

Under pressure, Western tech firms bow to Russian demands to share cyber secrets - Companies, including Cisco, IBM & SAP, are acceding to Moscow's demands for access to closely guarded product security secrets, at a time when Russia is accused of a growing number of cyber attacks on the West
Lionel Messi's 21-month prison sentence set to be swapped for fine worth less than one week's wage

France is to stop granting new licences for oil and gas exploration on the mainland and in overseas territories, Environment Minister Nicolas Hulot said. "There will be no new exploration licences for hydrocarbons, we will pass the law this autumn"
32TB of Windows 10 internal builds, core source code leak online

Massive Antarctic Ice Shelf Days From Breaking Off: For months, scientists have been watching the growing crack spread some 175 kilometers along the ice sheet with growing alarm. Now just 13 kilometers remain, keeping this chunk of ice attached to the main ice shelf.
